casebody.data:
Tuesday, November 7, 2000

MOTION DOCKET

00-1494. PPG Industries, Inc. v. Tracy.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 97-A-91. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of the joint motion to stay briefing schedule,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to stay briefing schedule be, and hereby is, granted.
